price: Does He not know His Own creation[4], when He is the Most Subtle, the All-Aware?
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
footnotes: [4] Or does He not know those whom He created?

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
